text: Chisimu kuchelewasya (mwesi wakuchimbichika kuti uwe wamalawi mâ€™malo mwaunouno) kuwele konjechesya pa ukafili, akusochelesyedwa nayo awala waakanile, (mwesi umopeo) akuutenda kuwa mwesi wamba chaka chine, chaka chine ni kuutenda kuwa wakuchimbichika, kuti awutile chiwalanjilo cha (myesi) jaajitesile Allah kuwa jakuchimbichika (kuti jikwanile), basi ni akujitenda (myesi) jakuchimbichika jila kuwa (myesi) wamba. Isalalisidwe kukwao itendo yao yangalumbana, soni Allah ngakwajongolaga wandu achimakafili
